Weapons or fists, you name it.
Weapons or fists, you name it.
Some say I'm quick tempered. The truth is, they are too slow.
Some say I'm quick tempered. The truth is, they are too slow.
Here’s something they don’t teach in the Legion : failing.
Here’s something they don’t teach in the Legion : failing.
I don't need arrows or bolts with a sword that long.
I don't need arrows or bolts with a sword that long.
You have something on your head… got it.
You have something on your head… got it.
Keep your friends distant, and your enemies even more.
Keep your friends distant, and your enemies even more.
There are two rules for success: 1) Don't tell all you know.
There are two rules for success: 1) Don't tell all you know.
People say a wizard never reveals his secrets, so I’m not going to tell you the rest of this story.
People say a wizard never reveals his secrets, so I’m not going to tell you the rest of this story.
Nothing can beat the power of the mind.
Nothing can beat the power of the mind.
Some of us feel the urge to choose between sorcery and weapons. I choose violence.
Some of us feel the urge to choose between sorcery and weapons. I choose violence.
I'm one with the Umbra, and the Umbra is with me.
I'm one with the Umbra, and the Umbra is with me.
Adaptation is the only reason our World survived so far.
Adaptation is the only reason our World survived so far.
I don't think that's intended, but that mixture tastes pretty good.
I don't think that's intended, but that mixture tastes pretty good.
I will have my vengeance, in this life or the next.
I will have my vengeance, in this life or the next.
A day without killing is a day wasted.
A day without killing is a day wasted.
Everybody dies eventually. But you first.
Everybody dies eventually. But you first.
Did you know that if I take all the veins from your body and lay them end to end… you will die ?
Did you know that if I take all the veins from your body and lay them end to end… you will die ?
I'm going to fill your body with holes. So to speak.
I'm going to fill your body with holes. So to speak.
My girlfriend accused me of cheating. I told her she was starting to sound like my wife.
My girlfriend accused me of cheating. I told her she was starting to sound like my wife.
Who said ranged weapons were meant to be used from a long distance ?
Who said ranged weapons were meant to be used from a long distance ?
Of course you should fight fire with fire. You should fight everything with fire.
Of course you should fight fire with fire. You should fight everything with fire.
Your body is a maze designed for Lightning to propagate.
Your body is a maze designed for Lightning to propagate.
Who need swords when you control the Storm ?
Who need swords when you control the Storm ?
